## Learning objectives

By the end of this module you should be able to:

- Use RStudio Projects to organize a data wrangling project.
- Understand how to use R scripts, R Markdown, and R Notebook documents to make your data wrangling projects and outputs reproducible.
- Import data from a variety of sources and perform basic tasks to understand simple attributes about your imported dataset.
- Describe key differences between different data structures.
